DOC.brief_summary: Specific aim : To test effect nasal expiratory positive airway pressure ( EPAP ) therapy sleep apnea severity among patient recent ischemic stroke . Hypothesis 1 : Ischemic stroke patient sleep apnea less severe sleep apnea , measure apnea-hypopnea index ( AHI ) , nasal EPAP therapy compare control night . Hypothesis 2 : Ischemic stroke patient higher mean level oxygen saturation nasal EPAP therapy compare control night .
DOC.brief_title: Nasal EPAP Stroke Patients With Sleep Apnea : Pilot Trial .
DOC.criteria: adult ischemic stroke ( include TIA infarction ) within prior 14 day 1 . Current use transnasal tube ( eg dobhoff tube ) 2 . Current use CPAP , mechanical ventilation , supplemental oxygen 3 . Known severe breathe disorder include hypercapnic respiratory failure , respiratory muscle weakness , bullous lung disease , bypass upper airway , pneumothorax , pneumomediastinum 4 . Severe heart disease ( include severe heart failure ) 5 . Pathologically low blood pressure 6 . An acute upper respiratory ( include nasal , sinus middle ear ) inflammation infection , perforation ear drum 7 . Sores , abrasion , skin mucosal irritation around nose . 8 . Known pregnancy 9 . Inability provide inform consent 10 . Use alpha blocker short act nitrate 11 . Permanent pacemaker 12 . Sustained nonsinus cardiac arrhythmia
